title: The Dogwalker
description: Daniel Radcliffe is a dog-walker, but heâ€™s got a chip on his shoulder. A real edge. Sundance loved it.
quote: I put them on a leash and walk them.
altHero: Daniel Radcliffe sits at a cafe table in the park with several dogs leashed nearby
